column5: Cute & Cozy 1 Bedroom 1 Bath condo with resort style pool and close to Schlitterbahn waterpark. Sleeps 4 comfortably and has a full size kitchen for all your dinner catches. Completely all new furniture and accessories. All the comforts of home with living the island life. Enjoy sitting out on the patio with a cool breeze, drinking your morning coffee, then take a drip in the pool or take a short 5 minute drive to the beach. Lots to do. National Seashore, Bob Hall pier, Packery Channel nearby.
column8: Coastal Island Life Newly Furnished sleeps 4
